message: Given that you face higher inflation (10%) than I do (5%), this split is fair and we should agree quickly to maximize value for both of us.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe a more balanced split is fair. While I do face higher inflation, the initial split should be more equitable. This offer still gives you a good value considering your lower inflation rate. If we continue negotiating, we both lose value, so accepting this balanced offer now maximizes our collective outcome.
